pages.text: A shield that doubles as a ranged weapon.$(br2)$(3)$(l)Special:$() Shift-right click to toggle between shield and ranged weapon modes.$(br2)$(n)Tip:$() The last word in the shield's name tells you what it can do.
Combine a $(l:extrastuck:shields/riot_shield)riot shield$(/l) and a trident in a totem lathe.
